title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Stacks and Bowers just sent out their first "Physical Crypto Newsletter" emailIf anyone wants to be included on the list, just send me your email and I will forward to James at Stacks!!

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Thanks for sharing MJ...James has my email and I have still yet to receive....when did he send out the emails?

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on November 02, 2023, 09:41:02 PM  Thanks for sharing MJ...James has my email and I have still yet to receive....when did he send out the emails? I got mine, titled "Physical Bitcoin as a Numismatic Collectible" @ Wednesday, November 1, 2023 6:16:28 PM (Your time). I think I'm signed up for all their spam/auctions tho too.. Edit - can forward to you too ofc, just ping me.

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on November 02, 2023, 09:41:02 PM  Thanks for sharing MJ...James has my email and I have still yet to receive....when did he send out the emails? I've been meaning to submit something guessing it's too late for this round.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: they produce also paper catalogue for auctions?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on November 13, 2023, 12:51:59 PMthey produce also paper catalogue for auctions? yes

comments.author: SurfinPanda
comments.body: Yah really cool paper catalogues every quarter (so 4 sets of catalogues per year) which are mailed out a few weeks before their quarterly crypto auction. Really good quality print too.SP

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
